column5: Dang that is one happy Dude congrats to him for sure that is a awesome ride and he sure shows it. Dave sorry about loosing your ride but if you want come down here I will take you out heck ya can bring Ryan also.  Cheers Mike
Everyone should watch the vid of Dario getting his boat.  He is happy.
I cried for him since he didn't!
Ya he's one happy guy. And so he should be. Congrats. Anyone else see #15 on the list. Kim Mitchell.
I hope his boss or manager is a fishing fan. It`d suck if he won the boat and lost his job lol.
Find out today at 1:00.. i hope its an OFC'r  http://www.factsoffishing.com/
I've made room in my driveway for it.
Ahh I almost forgot that was today....I need to start shopping for trucks to pull it.
Wondered what that spot was for that I parked in yesterday......
You'll have to park on the street next time John.  Well it's 1:21 and I don't see any results yet Dave, Dave, DAVE!
He's crying Chris. Leave him alone.
Dario Petrie from Richmond Hill Ontario CONGRATULATIONS
Well at least the winner was VERY happy.  Congrats to Daro (not sure of the spelling).
LOL.....    Well congrats to Dario, awesome score!  Do you have a link for the winners list CD, I must be blind.
Congrats Dario!!!!!!!!!!!!!!
Anyone know him and is he an OFC member?  Dirk
No,it's posted on his youtube site,I went to the facts of fishing site and linked to his youtube site from there
That was awesome.  Dario's a lucky guy.  I wonder if he's got a truck to pull that big rig!
That's an awesome rig!! Congrats Dario!!
Thanks for the link Roy, that was truly awesome.  Dario's shock and genuine excitement had me choked up for a minute.  Huge congratulations to Dario, enjoy and be safe.
Its on www.factsoffishing.com main page as well guys! If not its likely because your browser is using old cookies!  Congrats to Dario - he's an awesome dude!
Here it is http://factsoffishing.com/video/hook-line-and-subway-winner/
If it was me (it's not) I wouldn't be saying boo about it.  Besides I'd be too busy fishin'

I think I missed 78. Geoff W - Brooklin...
Dave - did you really head straight to the lake and fish with him?  Where'd you go?  What'd you catch?  Or was it more of a "here's how to drive this bad boy" lesson?
Yup, a few OFNers in that bunch. Congrats to everyone and thank you Dave Mercer, Subway and all of the sponsors. It was a great contest and the Dario finale was perfect.
So Dave what are you gonna be driving in now?
Congrats to Dario!!   Enjoy the new ride!!
He's diggin' out that belly boat from last year. ...  and trying to put a small yammy on it.
